name: Meco
description: '''Domenico Monardo''' (November 29, 1939 â€“ May 26, 2023), known as '''Meco''', was an American record producer and musician, as well as the name of his band or production team. Meco is best known for his 1977 [[space disco]] version of the [[Star Wars Theme/Cantina Band|''Star Wars'' theme]] from his album ''[[Star Wars and Other Galactic Funk]]''; both the single and album were [[RIAA certification|certified platinum]] in the US.
